report.title: Occurrences Download 2 GIS
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the explore report parameters. Includes GIS output.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) #idlist#

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

modifiers.where: o.certainty IS NOT NULL AND o.certainty='C' AND o.record_status NOT IN ('D','R')
(o.certainty in ('C', 'L') OR (o.certainty IS NULL)) AND o.record_status NOT IN ('D','R'))

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

param.name: vice_county_location_type_term
param.preprocess: SELECT id FROM cache_termlists_terms WHERE termlist_title='Location types' AND term='#vice_county_location_type_term#'

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: name
column.sql: case when cttl.preferred_taxon=coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, '') then cttl.preferred_taxon else cttl.preferred_taxon || case when cttl.default_common_name is null then '' else ' - ' || cttl.default_common_name end end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null and onf.privacy_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then snf.public_entered_sref else replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(snf.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: vicecounty
column.sql: (SELECT string_agg(vc.name, '; ') FROM locations vc WHERE vc.location_type_id=#vice_county_location_type_term# AND vc.name NOT LIKE '%+%' AND vc.id = ANY(o.location_ids))

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE onf.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || onf.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE onf.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Accepted as correct' WHEN 2 THEN 'Accepted as considered correct' ELSE 'Accepted' END WHEN 'C' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 3 THEN 'Plausible' ELSE 'Record Submitted' END WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'R' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 4 THEN 'Rejected as considered incorrect' WHEN 5 THEN 'Rejected as incorrect' ELSE 'Rejected' END WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END
